post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Dear Chil-Hoan:

I hope everything is going well with you. I would be happy to hear
about your current status and career goals. If this message found you in
error please accept my apologies, but feel free to send me your updated
resume. This will enable me to look for suitable and challenging
positions for you. Urgently, we are looking for an Oracle Developer. Following
you will find the job description.

If you already obtained a position through VTRAC, please disregard this
message and kindly forward this message to your friends.

Please let me know if you are interested or you know anyone who might
be interested in this position. Also, I would appreciate it if you could
pass our company's name and our Website www.vtrac.com to your friends
who have strong expertise in Developing.

Thank you and best regards,

Rod Power
VTRAC Corporation
366 Bay Street, Suite 500
Toronto, ON, M5H 4B2, Canada
Phone: (416) 366-2600 ext. 220
Fax: (416) 366-5550
e-mail: rodp@vtrac.com
www.vtrac.com


VTRAC Consultants Corporation
"Solutions for Growth"

POSITION: Database Developer
STATUS: Permanent
LOCATION: Toronto
JOB #: 11145

Please e-mail your resume as Ms-Word attached document with reference
to Oracle Developer in confidence to rodp@vtrac.com or call: (416)
366-2600 x 220

Key Accountabilities / Activities:

Oracle PL/SQL developer to enhance on an internally developed PL/SQL
project. This project involves developing code to load, scrub, and
summarize hundreds of millions of rows daily, with summarized data being
transferred to reporting repositories. The successful candidate will
continue PL/SQL development of the existing system, while investigating,
designing, developing, and implementing improved strategies.

Major Activities:
* Participate in design, engineering, configuration, testing and
performance tuning of Oracle data database environment. Provide technical
leadership in evaluating the design and coordinating the initiatives with
application development teams.
* Support production environments, configuration, testing, and
performance tuning of all Oracle database environments.
* Managing problem/project tickets queue and maintaining communication
with business team members.
* Actively provide leadership and technical expertise to ongoing
problem identification/resolution and root cause analysis process.
* Participate as a team member in evaluating system resource
utilization and storage usage/capacity, and makes recommendations to increase
application performance to meet business and financial requirements.

Requirements:
* Architectural experience developing
* Knowledge of techniques for transferring data between databases
* 3 years experience in PL/SQL development
* Application performance tuning experience
* Experience with Oracle database (10g experience an asset)
* DBA experience considered an asset
* Familiarity with JDBC an asset

Technologies:

* Support, administer, and maintain Oracle 8i,9i & 10g environments
under UNIX.
* Oracle High Availability architectures (RAC, DATA GUARD)
* Oracle Enterprise Manager Diagnostic Pack, Tuning Pack
* Oracle Enterprise Edition Option Packs (OLAP, Data Mining)
* Sun Solaris 2.6, 2.8, & 2.9, Win2k & Win3K

We thank all the candidates in advance. Only those candidates that are
selected for interview will be contacted. For other exciting
opportunities, please visit us at www.vtrac.com.
post.title: Database Developer
